title: BMMJ01
description: Machine guard opened or PLC is not receiving guard protection signal. Check Guard switch input in PLC input card-3.
reasons_remedies: Check whether the guard switch is engaged correctly.
Check the guard switch for any faults.
Replace the guard switch if needed.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMMJ01
Error Code 01
Category: BMMJ
Title: BMMJ01
Alarm Message: Guard Open 1- 17
Description: Machine guard opened or PLC is not receiving guard protection signal. Check Guard switch input in PLC input card-3.
Reason & Remedy:
1. The machine guard is open.
2. Close guard.
3. Check whether the guard switch is engaged correctly.
4. Check electrical wiring.
5. Check the guard switch for any faults.
6. Replace the guard switch if needed.
7. (Guard Switch)
8. (Guard Latch)

- Guard switch image
